{"id":791969833,"question_id":42,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1662367902,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/791969833/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"48.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int trap(int[] height) {\n        int l=0, r=height.length-1;\n        int leftMax = height[l];\n        int rightMax = height[r];\n        \n        int res = 0;\n        while(l<r){\n            \n            if(leftMax<=rightMax){\n                l++;\n                leftMax = Math.max(leftMax, height[l]);\n                res += leftMax-height[l];\n                \n                \n            }else{\n                r--;\n                rightMax = Math.max(rightMax, height[r]);\n                res+=rightMax-height[r];\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
